ARABIC: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلْغَرْبِىِّ إِذْ قَضَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلْأَمْرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You were not on the western side when We gave Musa the command. You were not a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Muhammad), you were then not on the western side when We bestowed this commandment (of Law), and you were not among its witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you were not present at the west bank to witness when We gave the commandments to Moses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) were not on the western side of the Mount when We sent the command of Prophethood to Moosa, and you were not present. (Yet you narrate the account very clearly to the Jews and Christians.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you were not on the western side (of the Mount), when We made clear to Musa the commandment, and you were not among the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you were not on the western side when We revealed to Musa the commandment, and you were not among the witnesses;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou wast not upon the western side when We decreed to Moses the commandment, nor wast thou of those witnessing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And thou (Muhammad) wast not on the western side (of the Mount) when We expounded unto Moses the commandment, and thou wast not among those present;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You were not present on the western side of the Mount when We gave Our Command to Moses: nor were you among the witnesses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thou wast not on the western side when We decreed the affair unto Musa, and thou wast not of the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You were not on the western side when We revealed the commandments to Moses, nor were you among the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou wast not on the Western side when We decreed the Commission to Moses, nor wast thou a witness (of those events).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you (O Muhammad SAW) were not on the western side (of the Mount), when We made clear to Musa (Moses) the commandment, and you were not among those present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Prophet Muhammad) you were not on the western side (of the mountain) when We decreed the commandment to Moses, nor were you among thosewitnessing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You were not on the Western Side when We decreed the command to Moses, nor were you among the witnesses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:44] And you were not, O Muhammad (s), on the western side, of the mountain, the valley, or the spot, [to the west] of Moses at the time of the communion, when We decreed, revealed, to Moses the commandment, to deliver the Message to Pharaoh and his people, nor were you among the witnesses, to this, to know it and inform of it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And thou) Muhammad (wast not on the western side (of the Mount) when We exposited unto Moses the commandment) when We commanded Moses to go to Pharaoh, (and thou wast not among those present) there;
